definition: to rob/to plunder/to seize by force/to coerce/calamity/abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]

sentences.english: Passengers had rebelled against the hijackers, who had turned the plane toward Washington.
sentences.chinese: 劫机者将飞机掉头飞往华盛顿，乘客们奋起反抗。

sentences.english: Air traffic controllers had already informed the military about the hijacking.
sentences.chinese: 空中交通管制员已通知军方有关劫机的事情。

sentences.english: 37 a.m.: Air traffic control reports the hijacking to the US military.
sentences.chinese: 空管向美国军方报告了劫机事件。

sentences.english: We certainly don't want a highjack to ha en on the plane today.
sentences.chinese: 我们当然不希望在今天的飞机上发生劫机事件。

sentences.english: When we were informed of the seizure of the hijacker, there was big applause.
sentences.chinese: 当知道劫机者被制服，大家不禁拍掌欢呼。

sentences.english: After three days, the hijackers surrendered to the police .
sentences.chinese: 三天后，劫机犯向警察局自首了。

sentences.english: They refused to extradite the hijackers to the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝把劫机犯人引渡到美国。

sentences.english: Jean-Louis Borloo, the French minister in charge of transport, said hijacking had been ruled out.
sentences.chinese: 法国运输部长让路易博洛表示已经排除劫机的可能。

sentences.english: We certainly don't want a highjack to happen on the plane today.
sentences.chinese: 我们当然不希望在今天的飞机上发生劫机事件。

sentences.english: In each case the hijackers bluffed the crew using fake grenades.
sentences.chinese: 每一个案例中，劫机者都用了假手榴弹吓唬机组人员。

sentences.english: We certainly do not want a highjack to ha en on the plane today.
sentences.chinese: 我们当然不希望在今天的飞机上发生劫机事件。

sentences.english: The hijacker was lifted immediately after he stepped down the plane.
sentences.chinese: 劫机犯刚走下飞机就被捕了。

sentences.english: These hijackers are often members of international terrorist organisations.
sentences.chinese: 这些劫机犯的成员往往是国际恐怖组织。

sentences.english: The hijackers claimed that they had a bomb.
sentences.chinese: 劫机客宣称他们身怀炸弹。

sentences.english: Day that plane was hijacked, I was incarcerated, kid.
sentences.chinese: 劫机那天，我被关在牢里呢，小子。

sentences.english: However, more recently, there have been serious developments in hijackers.
sentences.chinese: 然而，最近，劫机犯出现了严重的事态发展。

definition: to kidnap/to hijack/to abduct/to hold under duress
(of a plane, ship etc) to have an accident (plane crash, shipwreck, vehicle collision etc)/to mess things up
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
